title: Post-patch maintenance lenght
body:
Can somebody explain why post-patch maintenance on EUNE takes 3 hours while it takes 2 hours on EUW ?

Scheduled from 2:00 till 5:00 EUNE
from 5:00 till 7:00 EUW

Feels like I am missing something. I just dont know what.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Each region is unique, so maintenance times can vary.  Be sure to bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page in case there are any delays or issues occurring.  I hope that helps!
